main.welcome_body:
At the University of Lleida, an audio sampling is being carried out, where each one consists of a blow. With these samples, the aim is to carry out an application to obtain the lung age as a spirometer would do.

During the use of the application, no information (IP, email, phone number) will be saved that would allow the sample to be related to the participant. The audio files will be sent to a server at the University of Lleida directly through a secure connection. The University of Lleida does not have access to the medical records of the people who use the application, since these files are totally dissociated and cannot be related to any profile or medical record.

A later version of the application will end up being a free spirometer

recordPopup.step1: 1-	Go to a place without noise.
recordPopup.step2: 2-	Maintain a distance of 20 cm to the mobile.
recordPopup.step2desktop: 2-	Maintain a distance of 20 cm to the computer.
recordPopup.step3: 3-	Press the 'Cough' button. Cough 4/5 times. Press "Stop" when finished.
recordPopup.step4: 4-	Press the 'Vowels' button. Say all the vowels (A E I O U) separately. Press "Stop" when finished.
